body_html: @KhabarlakKonstantin As @petemounce pointed out, you can safely ignore that error. And you can also skip rm -rf C:/tmp/Bazel/44EoGNou if the Device or resource busy error is blocking you. I guess it's because it tried to remove jvm.out before jvm fully shutdown after invoking bazel shutdown.
body_text: @KhabarlakKonstantin As @petemounce pointed out, you can safely ignore that error. And you can also skip rm -rf C:/tmp/Bazel/44EoGNou if the Device or resource busy error is blocking you. I guess it's because it tried to remove jvm.out before jvm fully shutdown after invoking bazel shutdown.
body: @KhabarlakKonstantin As @petemounce pointed out, you can safely ignore that error. And you can also skip `rm -rf C:/tmp/Bazel/44EoGNou` if the `Device or resource busy` error is blocking you. I guess it's because it tried to remove `jvm.out` before jvm fully shutdown after invoking `bazel shutdown`.
